movie.title: Run Lola Run
movie.actors: Franka Potente, Moritz Bleibtreu, Herbert Knaup, Nina Petri
movie.plot: Lola receives a phone call from her boyfriend Manny. He lost 100,000 DM in a subway train that belongs to a very bad guy. Lola has 20 min to raise this amount and meet Manni. Otherwise, he will rob a store to get the money. Three different alternatives may happen depending on some minor event along Lola's run.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 29 wins & 16 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: More fun than a barrel of Jean-Paul Sartre, pic's energy riffs on an engaging love story and really human performances while offering a series of what-ifs and a blood-stirring soundtrack.
